trans-unit.source: Create and Assign Rights to a Local User

seg-source.mrk: Create and Assign Rights to a Local User

target.mrk: Créer et attribuer des droits à un utilisateur local

trans-unit.source: When installing <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, a local administrator is created by default with the following identity:

seg-source.mrk: When installing <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, a local administrator is created by default with the following identity:

target.mrk: Lors de l'installation de <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, un administrateur local est créé par défaut avec l'identité suivante :

trans-unit.source: Username: superadmin.

seg-source.mrk: Username: superadmin.

target.mrk: Nom d'utilisateur : superadmin.

trans-unit.source: Password: superadmin.

seg-source.mrk: Password: superadmin.

target.mrk: Mot de passe : superadmin.

trans-unit.source: It is strongly recommended that you modify the password of the superadmin user as soon as possible. To reset the password of an existing user, go to step 9 of the following procedure.

seg-source.mrk: It is strongly recommended that you modify the password of the superadmin user as soon as possible.
To reset the password of an existing user, go to step 9 of the following procedure.

target.mrk: Il est fortement recommandé de modifier le mot de passe de l'utilisateur superadmin dès que possible.
Pour réinitialiser le mot de passe d'un utilisateur existant, passez à l'étape 9 de la procédure suivante.

trans-unit.source: To add a user

seg-source.mrk: To add a user

target.mrk: Pour ajouter un utilisateur

trans-unit.source: Log into the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> with administrator privileges.

seg-source.mrk: Log into the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> with administrator privileges.

target.mrk: Connectez-vous à la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> avec des privilèges administrateur.

trans-unit.source: Select Server > Users.

seg-source.mrk: Select Server > Users.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez Serveur > Utilisateurs.

trans-unit.source: Assign a tenant to the user using the drop-down list in the top bar of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Assign a tenant to the user using the drop-down list in the top bar of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Affectez une entité à l'utilisateur à l'aide de la liste déroulante dans la barre supérieure de la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: To create a regular user or an administrator, select a specific tenant.

seg-source.mrk: To create a regular user or an administrator, select a specific tenant.

target.mrk: Pour créer un utilisateur standard ou un administrateur, sélectionnez une entité spécifique.

trans-unit.source: To create a superadmin user, select All tenants.

seg-source.mrk: To create a superadmin user, select All tenants.

target.mrk: Pour créer un utilisateur superadmin, sélectionnez Toutes les entités.

trans-unit.source: In the Users view, click the button.

seg-source.mrk: In the Users view, click the button.

target.mrk: Dans la vue Utilisateurs, cliquez sur le bouton .

trans-unit.source: The user parameters interface appears.

seg-source.mrk: The user parameters interface appears.

target.mrk: L'interface des paramètres utilisateur s'affiche.

trans-unit.source: Type the local user name.

seg-source.mrk: Type the local user name.

target.mrk: Saisissez le nom d'utilisateur local.

trans-unit.source: You can change the user name after the user creation. For an LDAP user, the user must be in the form: user@domain.

seg-source.mrk: You can change the user name after the user creation.
For an LDAP user, the user must be in the form: user@domain.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez changer le nom de l'utilisateur après sa création.
Pour un utilisateur LDAP, l'utilisateur doit être sous la forme : user@domain.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Add a comment.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) Add a comment.

target.mrk: (Optionnel) Ajoutez un commentaire.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Select Local user as the type of user.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) Select Local user as the type of user.

target.mrk: (Optionnel) Sélectionnez Utilisateur local comme type d'utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Enable or disable the user. By default, users are enabled. A disabled user cannot log into the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) Enable or disable the user.
By default, users are enabled.

A disabled user cannot log into the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: (Optionnel) Activez ou désactivez l'utilisateur.
Par défaut, les utilisateurs sont activés.

Un utilisateur désactivé ne peut pas se connecter sur la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Provide a password for the local user.

seg-source.mrk: Provide a password for the local user.

target.mrk: Saisissez un mot de passe pour l'utilisateur local.

trans-unit.source: When a user is created, the password field is replaced by an option. To reset the user password, toggle the Change the password, then enter a new password.

seg-source.mrk: When a user is created, the password field is replaced by an option.
To reset the user password, toggle the Change the password, then enter a new password.

target.mrk: Lorsqu'un utilisateur est créé, le champ mot de passe est remplacé par une option.
Pour réinitialiser le mot de passe utilisateur, faites glisser le bouton Changer le mot de passe, puis saisissez un nouveau mot de passe.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Provide the e-mail address of the local user.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) Provide the e-mail address of the local user.

target.mrk: (Optionnel) Fournissez une adresse e-mail pour l'utilisateur local.

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">The email address can also be modified on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" />. For more details, see the <MadCap:variable name="General.UserGuideTitleUser" />.</MadCap:conditionalText>

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">The email address can also be modified on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" />.
For more details, see the <MadCap:variable name="General.UserGuideTitleUser" />.</MadCap:conditionalText>

target.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">L'adresse e-mail peut également être modifiée sur l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" />.
Pour plus de détails, voir la <MadCap:variable name="General.UserGuideTitleUser" /></MadCap:conditionalText>

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Select a user group to grant rights to the user. A profile is associated with a user group and therefore grants rights to it. If no group is selected, new users are added to the Default User Group. See Creating a User Profile and Creating a User Group for more details.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) Select a user group to grant rights to the user.
A profile is associated with a user group and therefore grants rights to it.
If no group is selected, new users are added to the Default User Group.

See <MadCap:xref href="Create_Configure_User_Profile.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creating a User Profile</MadCap:xref> and <MadCap:xref href="Create_Configure_Local_User_Group.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creating a User Group</MadCap:xref> for more details.

target.mrk: (Optionnel) Sélectionnez un groupe d'utilisateurs pour assigner des droits à un utilisateur.
Un profil est associé à un groupe d'utilisateurs et lui attribue, de ce fait, des droits.
Si aucun groupe n'est sélectionné, tout nouvel utilisateur est ajouté au Groupe d'utilisateurs par défaut.

Voir <MadCap:xref href="Create_Configure_User_Profile.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creating a User Profile</MadCap:xref> et <MadCap:xref href="Create_Configure_Local_User_Group.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creating a User Group</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: Click Create.

seg-source.mrk: Click Create.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Créer.

trans-unit.source: If you want to edit information of a local user, click the user name in the list of users, then edit the user details and click Save.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to edit information of a local user, click the user name in the list of users, then edit the user details and click Save.

target.mrk: Si vous souhaitez modifier les informations d'un utilisateur local, cliquez sur le nom d'utilisateur dans la liste des utilisateurs, puis modifiez les détails de l'utilisateur et cliquez sur Enregistrer.
